Travis Preston assembles his team for an expedition to a remote region in
China's hinterland, where a wild animal that the locals believe to be a
primeval monster they call the "Shocate" is said to roam free. Travis's nemesis
Jim Harker, a merciless trophy hunter, has already set up camp.
